title: US Poverty Rates Graph - Associated Trend

content.prompt: Which of the following developments was most directly associated with the general trend depicted in the graph between 1964 and 1974 ?

choices.label: The growth in jobs in the military during the Vietnam War
The passage of new government programs through the Great Society
The increase in migration to the United States after immigration reform
The creation of new social networks through digital technological innovations

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
